page.title: 19Morchard Bishop's Industry-2
page.content: The{Thatcher}-The main thatching business has been in the same family for several generations.Norfolk reed is so expensive nowadays that most reed is imported from Austria and Hungary.When wheat straw is used it is obtained mainly from local farmers and is known as reed straw.Long straw thatching is rarely used now due to the modern harvesting machinery... however the implements used have not altered and are still as they originally were.Recently,grants have been available for re-thatching which has helped to revive the craft as well as renovation of old cottages.
